QuestData.Title: Quality of Life
QuestData.Description: I am afraid, $n. We're so close to home, so close to salvation...$b$bAstoril says he knows the rest of the way through and can get us there safely. I believe him, but you've come this far to see us safe. Will you see this through to the end?
QuestData.RewardText: This is a most troubling tale. $b$bYou have done a good thing, $n. Now he will no longer torment our people.
